dialogue.content:
**Next question:**  
Find the least common multiple (LCM) of 12 and 18.

I think the LCM is 36, because the multiples of 12 are 12, 24, 36, 48… and the multiples of 18 are 18, 36, 54… so the smallest number they share is 36.
